column2: "Nna EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Kɔ Farao nkyɛn
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Hebriwfo Nyankopɔn se nye yi

column2: "Na sɛ ammpen ma wɔaannkɔ
column3: na eda ho ara tsintsim hɔn do a
column6: EWURADZE nsa wɔ wo mbowa a wɔwɔ haban mu do
column7: na ɔdze mbowawu yayaayaw bɛba mpɔnkɔ

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze sorbi bɔto Israel mbowa nye Egypt mbowa ntamu na dza ɔyɛ Israelmba dze no nyinara mu biara nnkowu."
"Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ aber
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔkyena na EWURADZE bɛyɛ adze yi wɔ asaase no do."

column2: "Na adze kyee no EWURADZE yɛɛ adze no
column3: na Egypt mbowa nyinara wuwui: na Israelmba mbowa dze no mu kor mpo ennwu."

column2: "Na Farao somae
column3: na hwɛ
column4: nna Israelfo mbowa mu kor mpo nnwui. Na Farao n’akoma sorowee

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column3: Hom mfa fononoo mu nso nsama nsama
column4: na Moses ntow mpetse wimu wɔ Farao enyim."

column2: "Na ɔbɛdan tutuw wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do
column3: na ɔayɛ mpɔmpɔ a ɔpaapaa tutu ekur wɔ nyimpa nye mbowa ho

column2: "Na wɔfaa fononoo mu nso
column3: na wokegyinaa Farao enyim; na Moses towee petsee wimu; na ɔdaan pɔmpɔ a ɔpaapaa tutu ekur wɔ nyimpa nye mbowa ho."

column2: "Na osian mpɔmpɔ no ntsi akɔmfo no enntum enngyina Moses enyim; osiandɛ nna mpɔmpɔ no abobɔ akɔmfo no nye Egyptfo nyinara."
"Na EWURADZE piriim Farao n’akoma
column3: na oenntsie hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Soɛr anapaatu
column7: Hebriwfo Nyankopɔn no se nye yi

column2: "Na afei dze merema me yardɔm nyinara aba w’akoma do
column3: nye wo nkowaa do
column4: nye wo man do; ama eehu dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ emi wɔ asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na afei sɛ matsen me nsa
column3: na medze owuyar abɔ ɔwo nye wo man a
column4: nkyɛ woetwa wo efi asaase do:"

column2: "na ampaara iyi ntsi na mama egyina hɔ
column3: dɛ mebɛkyerɛ wo mo tum
column4: na wɔaabɔ me dzin akyerɛ wɔ asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Eda ho ara rema woho do wɔ me man do
column3: dɛ eremma wɔnnkɔ anaa?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔkyena siseber yi mebɛma ɔsorbo a n’ano yɛ dur dodoodow a ne saso mmbaa Egypt pɛn ofi da a wɔkyekyeree dze bodu ndɛ yi atɔ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei soma na wɔnkɛfa wo mbowa nye biribiara a ewɔ wɔ haban mu nyina mbra ntsɛm; na nyimpa biara nye abowa biara a wobohu hɔn wɔ haban mu
column3: na wɔammfa hɔn ammba fie no

column2: "Farao nkowaa mu nyia osuroo EWURADZE n’asɛm no maa no nkowaa nye ne fiembowa guanee baa fie."
"Na nyia oemmbu EWURADZE n’asɛm bi no gyaa no nkowaa nye ne fiembowa wɔ haban mu."
"Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Tsen wo nsa wɔ sor
column4: ma ɔsorbo mbra Egypt asaase nyinara do
column7: nye haban mu efuw biara do

column2: "Na Moses tseen no poma no wɔ sor: na EWURADZE maa senaman nye ɔsorbo bae
column3: na ogya porowee guu asaase do; na EWURADZE tɔɔ ɔsorbo guu Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Nna ɔsorbo no bae
column3: na ogya a ɔdzɛw brambram toatoa mu a ɔfora ɔsorbo no mu a n’ano yɛ dzen dodoodow a ne saso mmbaa Egypt asaase nyinara do pɛn ofi da a ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔman no."

column2: "Na ɔsorbo no hwee Egypt asaase nyinara do dza ɔwɔ haban mu nyinara
column3: nyimpa nye abowa nyina; na ɔsorbo no hwee haban mu efuw nyinara
column4: na obubuu haban mu ndua nyinara."

column2: "Gosen asaase do mbrɛ Israelmba wɔ no nko na ɔsorbo no bi ammba."
"Na Farao somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ Moses nye Aaron
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Afei dze mayɛ bɔn: EWURADZE dzi bem
column5: na emi nye me man yɛyɛ afɔdzifo."

column2: "Hom mpa EWURADZE kyɛw; na asenaman dzendzen yi nye ɔsorbo no adɔɔ so; na mebɛma hom akɔ
column3: na hom renntsena ha bio."

column2: "Na Moses see no dɛ
column3: Mefi kurow mu akɔ ara a
column4: nkyɛ matserɛw me nsamu akyerɛ EWURADZE; asenaman no begyaa
column5: nkyii so ɔsorbo biara nnkɛba bio; ama eehu dɛ asaase yɛ EWURADZE dze."

column2: "Na ɔwo nye wo nkowaa dze
column3: minyim dɛ hom nnyae nnsuroo EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bi."

column2: "Na ɔhwee asaaba nye atoko: osiandɛ atoko no ayɛ mbɛtsem
column3: na asaaba no so abɔ nkukuduuduw."

column2: "Na ewifua nye ewu dze wɔannhwe hɔn: osiandɛ nna wonntuu mpon biara."
"Na Moses fi Farao nkyɛn fii kurow no mu
column3: na ɔkɛtserɛɛw ne nsamu kyerɛɛ EWURADZE
column4: na nsenaman nye ɔsorbo no gyaae
column5: na nyankom no woennhue enngu asaase no do."

column2: "Na Farao hun dɛ nyankom
column3: nye ɔsorbo

column2: "Na Farao n’akoma pirimii
column3: na ɔamma Israelmba annkɔ; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses do kae no."
